summary: Personal portfolio/resume website with project listings, VR training section, and resume experience entries. User is updating job titles throughout the site from Unreal Engine Developer variants to Technical Designer variants.

existing_features.title: In the Projects section, update the title for the Residency project entry from 'Lead Unreal Engine Developer' to 'Lead Technical Designer'.
In the Projects section, update the title for the Virtual Reality Trainings project entry from 'Unreal Engine Developer' to 'Technical Designer'.
In the Resume section, update the experience entry titled 'Lead Unreal Engine Developer' to 'Lead Technical Designer', keeping all other details (company, dates, description, etc.) unchanged.
In the Resume section, update the experience entry titled 'Unreal Developer' to 'Technical Designer', keeping all other details (company, dates, description, etc.) unchanged.

projectName: Update job titles from Unreal Engine Developer to Technical Designer across Projects and Resume
